summary: Experience the chronicle adventures of Mr. West and his faithful bodyguard and servant Jeddie, as they visit the land of the horrible and evil Bolsheviks.
cast: Porfiri Podobed|Boris Barnet|Aleksandra Khokhlova|Vsevolod Pudovkin|Sergey Komarov|Leonid Obolensky|Vera Lopatina|G. Kharlampiev|Pyotr Galadzhev|S. Sletov|Viktor Latyshevskiy|Andrei Gorchilin|Vladimir Fogel
